trans-unit.source: Creating XML Trees (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: Crear árboles XML (Visual Basic) | Documentos de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: Creating XML Trees (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: Crear árboles XML (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: One of the most common XML tasks is constructing an XML tree.
trans-unit.target: Una de las tareas XML más habituales es la construcción de un árbol XML.

trans-unit.source: This section describes several ways to create them.
trans-unit.target: Esta sección describe varias formas de crearlos.

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: En esta sección

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Tema

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descripción

trans-unit.source: [Functional Construction (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/functional-construction-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [Construcción funcional (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/functional-construction-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Provides an overview of functional construction in [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Proporciona información general acerca de la construcción funcional en [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Functional construction enables you to create all or part of your XML tree in a single statement.
trans-unit.target: La construcción funcional permite crear el árbol XML total o parcialmente en una sola instrucción.

trans-unit.source: This topic also shows how to embed queries when constructing an XML tree.
trans-unit.target: En este tema también se muestra cómo incrustar consultas al construir un árbol XML.

trans-unit.source: [Introduction to XML Literals in Visual Basic](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/introduction-to-xml-literals.md)
trans-unit.target: [Introducción a los literales XML en Visual Basic](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/introduction-to-xml-literals.md)

trans-unit.source: Provides a quick introduction to creating trees in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] by using XML literals.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona una rápida introducción a la creación de árboles de [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] mediante literales XML.

trans-unit.source: This topic includes links to the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] documentation of XML literals.
trans-unit.target: Este tema incluye vínculos a la documentación de [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] relativa a los literales XML.

trans-unit.source: [Cloning vs. Attaching (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/cloning-vs-attaching.md)
trans-unit.target: [Diferencias entre clonar y Conectando (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/cloning-vs-attaching.md)

trans-unit.source: Demonstrates the difference between adding nodes from an existing XML tree (nodes are cloned and then added) and adding nodes with no parent (they are simply attached).
trans-unit.target: Demuestra la diferencia entre agregar notas de un árbol XML existente (primero se clonan los nodos y luego se agregan) y agregar nodos sin elemento primario (simplemente se adjuntan).

trans-unit.source: [Parsing XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/parsing-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [Analizar XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/parsing-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to parse XML from a variety of sources.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo analizar XML desde varios orígenes.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] is layered on top of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, which is used to parse the XML.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)]se superpone <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, que se usa para analizar el XML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: [How to: Populate an XML Tree with an XmlWriter (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-populate-an-xml-tree-with-an-xmlwriter-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: rellenar un árbol XML con XmlWriter (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-populate-an-xml-tree-with-an-xmlwriter-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to populate an XML tree by using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo rellenar un árbol XML mediante un <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: [How to: Validate Using XSD (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-validate-using-xsd-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: validar con XSD (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-validate-using-xsd-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to validate an XML tree using XSD.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo validar un árbol XML mediante XSD.

trans-unit.source: [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/valid-content-of-xelement-and-xdocument-objects.md)
trans-unit.target: [Contenido válido de objetos XElement y XDocument](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/valid-content-of-xelement-and-xdocument-objects.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the valid arguments that can be passed to the constructors and methods that are used to add content to elements and documents.
trans-unit.target: Describe los argumentos válidos que se pueden pasar a los constructores y los métodos que se usan para agregar contenido a elementos y documentos.

trans-unit.target: Vea también

trans-unit.target: [Guía de programación (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/programming-guide-linq-to-xml.md)
